revised_title: Dissociation Energy of N-N Bond in Hydrazine: A Study of Thermal Decomposition
tldr: The author investigated the thermal decomposition of hydrazine at high temperatures and found that the dissociation energy of the N-N bond in hydrazine is 60 + 3 kcal/mol. The study also revealed that the decomposition process involves both heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, with the latter having a higher energy of activation.
